name: Code Quality and Maintainability Issues
expected_findings: Excessive nesting depth in calculate method (5 levels deep)
Unclear variable names (a, b, c, d, e, x, y, z)
Missing docstrings for class and both methods
calculate method returns 0 for any negative input without clear business logic justification
Repeated return 0 statements could be simplified
process method does nothing useful and should be removed or implemented
Missing test coverage for calculate method including positive inputs, negative inputs, edge cases, and validation of magic number calculations
Missing test coverage or clarification for process method purpose
